problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,直径CD交AB于点E,若AE=EB=3,∠C=15°,则OE的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the chord of ⊙O, and the diameter CD intersects AB at point E. If AE = EB = N_0, ∠C = N_1, then the length of OE is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接OA．∵AE=EB,∴CD⊥AB,∴⁀{AD}=⁀{BD},∴∠BOD=∠AOD=2∠ACD=30°,∴∠AOB=60°,∵OA=OB,∴△AOB是等边三角形,∵AE=3,∴OE=AE•tan60°=3√{3},故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查圆周角定理,勾股定理,垂径定理,解直角三角形等知识,解题的关键是熟练掌握基本知识,属于中考常考题型．
